content:
If there’s one thing I’ve learnt from my time on this planet, it’s the value of community. I am fortunate to be in the position that I am in today due of the many contributions, both large and small, given by theÂ countless people who have helped me along this journey. It truly does take a village, and I’d be remiss not to express my gratitude for the people who have made up mine by naming a few of them here.

So,

  • Mom
  • Dad
  • Nicholas
  • Auntie Gen
  • Uncle Arthur
  • Grandma & Grandpa
  • Uncle Phil
  • Afam
  • Lucas
  • The Green family
  • Taj
  • Ethan
  • Samir
  • Jordan Sealey
  • Delano
  • Mikaela
  • Nia
  • J.J.
  • Ananda
  • Jada
  • Coach Johnny
  • Coach Trina
  • Coach Jenkins
  • Coach Caulfield
  • Coach Lonergan & Coach Shaw
  • Dr. Alexandra To
  • The John D. O’Bryant African-American Institute staff
  • Dr. Castor
  • And many more not named here

From the bottom of my heart, thank you.
I promise that I’ll make you all proud.
title: Gratitude
